subject: Single Mothers
Athletics and Sports
College Athletics
Basketball
Parenting
lead_paragraph: Juggling basketball, books and a bouncing boy is complicated enough, but because her son’s father is Matt Leinart, Brynn Cameron’s balancing act has sometimes been a public one.
